TestedMethod.name: public Process exec(String command, String[] envp, File dir)

APITestDescription.Description:
The test is against exec1015 method. It exerecises the fillowing:
1) Executes the specified string command in a separate process with the specified environment and working diretory.
For testing purposes JVM is used. The String[] envp argument contains the "java.home" property. The "File dir" argument is null; there is, however, no special checks on it, that is, only the trivial check is perfrmed.
The test performs the following checks on the method. - If a String argument beginning with a "java" command contains the "-help" token, that is, the command to launch JVM is correct, the exit value returned on a process exit is 0. - If a String argument beginning with a "java" command contains no tokens, that is, the command to launch JVM is incorrect, the exit value returned on a process exit is 1.
